name: Knights of Townsville - RPG Maker 2003
description:
Hello! Welcome to Knights of Townsville.

In this game you play & command a squad of brave knights and defeat enemies, meet people, explore the world, kill bosses and level up and upgrade your ultimate squad!

There are 5 bosses, 4 characters to play as, a couple NPCs and endless weapons, shields and armors! 

Face off against big, challenging bosses, unique enemies and level up and get stronger along the way! It's about the journey, not the destination.

CONTROLS:

  • If you don't know what something does or where to go, talk to the chicken.
  • Press F4 on your keyboard to go fullscreen.
  • That's it really...

Did you enjoy the game? If so, donate to my Ko-Fi!

Support SebDev on Ko-fi!
